description: You just got three months of free Apple TV+, so what should you watch first? Here are some places to start, from Ted Lasso to Severance to some of the best sci-fi on TV like Foundation, Silo, and For All Mankind.
title: The Best Apple TV+ Shows to Try Out on the Streamer

description: Today's Nintendo Direct announcement of a new Virtual Game Cards feature for sharing games between systems is being met with surprise and interest from fans. But it's also raising some questions, most notably one about the Nintendo Switch 2, thanks to a fine print footnote on an official Nintendo webpage.
title: Nintendo Fine Print Reveals 'Nintendo Switch 2 Edition' Games and Fans Are Trying to Work Out What That Means

description: The developer and publisher of Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 has moved to "set the record straight," insisting it's not abandoning the game following the announcement of Space Marine 3.
title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Dev Moves to 'Set the Record Straight,' Insists It's Not Abandoning the Game Following Space Marine 3 Announcement

description: While some communities are having an absolute blast following today's Nintendo Direct, others aren't doing so hot. Specifically, I'm referring to the Hollow Knight: Silksong folks, who are once again putting on their clown makeup after no new trailer surfaced at the showcase. Fortunately, there's another one next week.
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Community Is Pinning a Lot of Hope on Next Week's Nintendo Direct

description: The newest models (including 2025) are all on sale.

description: The Avengers: Doomsday cast announcement was met with much fanfare, but it also sparked a significant amount of concern that Marvel decided to spoil the Thunderbolts by giving away which cast members would make it to Doomsday. Here's why fans shouldn't worry.
title: No, the Avengers: Doomsday Cast Announcements Didn't Spoil Thunderbolts (Probably)

description: An unannounced paid DLC for Hogwarts Legacy has been canceled, according to a report.

description: Reddit is down, with users struggling to view threads and comments.

description: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers' movesets are intricate and interesting, its RPG mechanics seem deep and offer a lot of freedom, and the boss fights gave us a serious run for our money – and that’s rare these days. All that’s already got us pretty excited to play more.
title: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers – The First Hands-on Preview

description: There weren't that many actual Avengers in the Avengers: Doomsday announcement. And that may give us some real hints about the future of the X-Men, the Thunderbolts, and Secret Wars.
title: The Apparent Lack of Actual Avengers in Doomsday May Give Us Big Secret Wars (and X-Men) Hints

description: Marvel Rivals developer NetEase Games quietly added a Venom twerk emote that lets Spider-Man’s longtime rival throw it back like never before. Here's how to unlock it.
title: Marvel Rivals Causes Chaos as Venom Twerk Emote Sneakily Shakes Its Way Into the Game

description: The Pokémon Company has officially addressed issues fans have had with getting their hands on recent Pokémon Trading Card Game sets, including Destined Rivals.

description: A new Super Robot Wars is on the way, and it's adding a popular Gundam to the mix. Super Robot Wars Y has been officially announced for PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch, and PC via Steam, and it'll see Suletta Mercury from Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch From Mercury make her series debut.
title: Gundam: The Witch From Mercury Makes Series Debut in Super Robot Wars Y

description: If you want to see some wild expressions of pure joy, check out the Tomodachi Life community today, who are celebrating all over social media in the wake of the announcement of Tomodachi Life: Living the Dream during Nintendo Direct March 2025.
title: Congratulations to the Tomodachi Life Community, Which Is Truly Living the Dream Right Now

description: Ubisoft has created a subsidiary company based on its Assassin’s Creed, Far Cry, and Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six brands, with a €1.16 billion (approx. $1.25 billion) investment from Chinese megacorp Tencent.
title: Embattled Ubisoft Forms Subsidiary for IPs Like Assassin's Creed, Far Cry and Rainbow Six With the Help of €1.16 Billion Tencent Investment

description: As of March 27, the Samsung 990 Pro 4TB SSD is on sale for $279.99 ($185 off) at Amazon. The new Surface Pro (Snapdragon X Elite) is also down to $949.99 ($450 off).

description: The Backbone One is back and with some Xbox touches that make it a unique version of the critically acclaimed mobile controller. It's available now for $109.99.

description: Nintendo has confirmed the Nintendo Switch 2's mysterious new Joy-Con button is indeed the C button, as had been rumored. But we still don't know what it does.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Image in the Nintendo Today! App Confirms Mystery Joy-Con Button Is Indeed the C Button

description: Originally £22.99, the Anker 313 power bank with a 1000mAh capacity is available to buy for its lowest-ever price of £6.99 at Amazon UK.

description: Assassin’s Creed Shadows has seen over 3 million players in the week since launch, Ubisoft has announced. But there's still no sales figure.

description: Nintendo Today is a new app from the Super Mario Bros. company itself that aims to bring Nintendo news to players a bit more directly than ever before.

description: Jason Statham phones it in as an ex-commando on a rescue mission in a lackluster and stodgily put-together action thriller.
title: A Working Man Review

description: Announced during Nintendo Direct March 2025, Marvel Cosmic Invasion is a retro brawler from Tribute Games, developer of the much-loved Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge. It’s due out on PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and 5, and Xbox in 2025.
title: Marvel Cosmic Invasion Is a Retro Beat ‘Em-Up From the Developer of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge

description: Nintendo made a number of big announcements during its Nintendo Directo March 2025 showcase, focusing on the original Switch ahead of the Switch 2 Direct. Here's everything announced.
title: Nintendo Direct March 2025: Everything Announced

description: Today's Nintendo Direct ended in a surprising and rather strange way, with the announcement of a brand new Tomodachi Life game after over a decade-long hiatus for the series. It's called Tomodachi Life: Living the Dream and it's not coming out until 2026.
title: Tomodachi Life: Living the Dream Announced for Nintendo Switch

description: Nintendo is updating how digital Nintendo Switch games work with what it’s calling Virtual Game Cards ahead of the impending launch of Nintendo Switch 2.
title: Nintendo Unveils Virtual Game Card Update Ahead of Switch 2 Launch

description: During today's Nintendo Direct, we saw some new gameplay for Pokemon Legends: Z-A, which showed off more footage of wild Pokemon, including wild Pokemon hanging out on rooftops, and a mysterious nighttime tournament called the Z-A Royale.
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A Gets New Trailer Showing Pokemon on Roofs, Late Night Trainer Battles

description: Announced during Nintendo Direct March 2025, Rhythm Heaven Groove is set to launch on Nintendo Switch in 2026.
title: Rhythm Heaven Is Bopping Onto Nintendo Switch at Long, Long Last

description: During today's Nintendo Switch Direct, we got another look at Metroid Prime 4: Beyond, including a fresh look at new, psychic-infused gameplay and a red-and-purple suit for Samus.
title: Metroid Prime 4 Gameplay Reveals Samus' New Psychic Abilities on the Planet Viewros

description: Arrow producer Marc Guggenheim is making his Comixology debut with an intriguing new sci-fi series called The Adventures of Ulysses Monarch.
title: Arrow's Marc Guggenheim Makes His Comixology Debut With The Adventures of Ulysses Monarch

description: We bet you didn't have a game like this on your BINGO card for this week. Check out the announcement trailer for Equinox: Homecoming – it'll take you on quite a ride (no pun intended). As the team at Blue Scarab (made up former Helldivers 2, Battlefield, World of Warcraft, and Star Stable developers) describes it, "Equinox is an open-world MMORPG for fans of murder mysteries, cozy escapism, and horses! Saddle up and charge into a mysterious adventure. Every trail leads to wonder and intrigue while uncovering an occult murder mystery."
title: Homecoming: Equinox Is a Half-Cozy Horseback-Riding MMO, and Half Occult Mystery

description: “Tel'aran'rhiod” uses the world of dreams to explore the fears, growth, and limitations of The Wheel of Time’s characters.
title: The Wheel of Time Season 3, Episode 5 Review – “Tel'aran'rhiod”

description: According to Best Buy Canada, Nintendo Switch 2 will go up for preorder April 2, same day as the Direct.

description: GameStop has announced it will be closing more stores, and also making a change to its investment policy. The video game retailer is getting into Bitcoin, as it's added the cryptocurrency as a treasury reserve asset.
title: GameStop Plans to Close a 'Significant Number' of Stores, And Invest Into Bitcoin

description: Ahead of the hotly anticipated Switch 2 Nintendo Direct, two former employees of the company have expressed concern about Mario Kart 9's ability to convince people to upgrade to Switch 2.
title: Ex-Nintendo PR Managers Question Whether Switch 2’s Mario Kart 9 Is the ‘Slam Dunk’ People Think It Is

description: Ultimate Spider-Man Vol. 1, "Married With Children" which collects issues 1-6, just dropped to its lowest price ever at Amazon.
